artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. Leather strips of different colors (red, brown, tan) make up the weft. Sample known to be development toward Leather Cloth (black, red, brown, tan)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc. %2F Leather Cloth%2C Jack Larsen%2C 1956
title: Leather Cloth
